user_query: Build a command-line tool that manages personal task lists with due dates and priorities
description: Create a CLI application for managing tasks with support for adding, listing, completing, and organizing tasks by priority and due date.

requirements.description: Tasks have title, description, due date, and priority fields
Tasks are persisted to a local JSON file
List command supports filtering by priority and due date
Output is formatted as a table with colored priority indicators

preferences.name: language
preferences.rationale: Standard library support for JSON and argparse
